name: AC servicing
des: AC Master Service offers detail cleaning of the indoor and outdoor units including minor problem-fixing (excluding materials and parts). The service charge varies on your AC amount, height, weight and difficulties.This service offers old Compressor removal and new Compressor installation. Compressor price and warranty differ as per manufacturer.

name: TV repair service
des: Service charge is fixed but the price will differ if any additional or replacing materials/parts installed. Customer will be solely responsible for their personal material and the safety of household resources.

name: Refrigerator Repair Service
des: Refrigerator repairing service is one of my services to repair all types of fridge or freezer related problems.Customer will be solely responsible for their personal material and the safety of household resources.
